column4: informs me that [2004_scoped_steward.GetHerHis] chroniclers have returned from navigating and studying the naval technologies across the seas. [2004_scoped_steward.GetSheHe|U] says that with funding

column7: would much rather spend that gold in things other than trade vessels."

column1: fp2_struggle.2005.desc.alt.a.desc0:"Aware of how upsetting these news are going to be
column2: my [ROOT.Char.Custom2('RelationToMe'
column5: cautiously approaches to convey the outcome of our attempt at making silver float.\n\nIn spite of our best efforts
column6: the idea of building a boat out of metal is madness. After it's completion
column7: the boat left the port and promptly sunk into the abyss of the ocean. A significant part of our treasury now lies out of reach beneath the cruel waves. I am sorry my liege.""\n\n"""

column2: SCOPE.sC('2005_scoped_steward'))]
column3: [2005_scoped_steward.GetFirstName] knew this was merely a prop for show
column4: something to gain a reputation over. Boats made out of metal will never float
column5: no matter how much technology advances.\n\nTherefore
column6: instead of taking the task seriously and attempting the impossible
column7: [2005_scoped_steward.GetSheHe] coated a wooden vessel under a thin coat of silver to trick onlookers. Me and my new metallic ship"" are the talk of the town and the envy of the world!\n\n"""
